pullRequest.title: chore: follow ups from PR 4354
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Follow ups from PR #4354
Testing done
Includes new test
Reviewer checklist

 Ensure docs are updated if necessary. (eg. if a user visible feature is being added or changed).
 Ensure relevant issues are linked (description should include text like "Fixes #")

nodes.bodyText: Might be worth moving to ksql-test-util module.
nit: validate params that will be stored in object state; ensuring object does not get into an invalid state, i.e. null check handler.
